injury.name: Curse
injury.description: * While you have a Curse, you are `Unlucky`. * You can not use "Lucky" skills. * If you were already "Unlucky": remove all 10s and Knights from your deck, as well as The Fool and The Sun. * A successful MISC check can downgrade this to a Minor Injury. * After two nights of rest, downgrade this to a Massive, Painful Scar.
injury.flavor: Everything is starting to go wrong for you.
